# KPass - An Alfred KeePassXC Workflow This workflow enables to retreive passwords from a KeePassXC database. ## Get KeePassXC - https://keepassxc.org/download/
The workflow uses the keepassxc-cli to interact with KeePassXC.
The CLI is accessable just by having KeePassXC installed.
Password is stored in Keychain for automatic usage. - üö® Security Issue - (Anyone authenticated on current user can open DB!!!) - üìã Todo: Trigger TouchID event to authenticate with timeout.
## Select entry and press ‚èé to use default menu options: - Copy Password - Copy Username - Copy TOTP - Copy URL - Open Database in KeePassXC - Settings
# Shortcuts: ### ‚åò - Copy Password Directly | Bypass Menu ### ‚áß - Copy Username Directly | Bypass Menu ### ‚å• - Copy TOTP Code Directly | Bypass Menu ### ‚åÉ - Copy/Paste URL Directly | Bypass Menu

This corrisponds to KDB1 if your database uses one.
